entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
